gwt.g2d.client.util
Class Cycle

java.lang.Object
  gwt.g2d.client.util.Cycle

public class Cycle
extends java.lang.Object

A simple cycle tracker that counts for a given number of ticks per cycle.

Author:
hao1300@gmail.com

Constructor Summary
Cycle(int count)
          Creates an infinite cycle that counts for the given number of ticks per cycle.
Cycle(int count, int numCycle)
          Creates a cycle tracker that runs for the given number of cycles.
 
Method Summary
 boolean cycleTick()
          Perform a tick in the cycle.
 void resetTick()
          Resets the count down in this cycle.
